original_title: The Spice Girls Story: Viva Forever!
overview: 15 years after they first took the world by storm, a new musical about the girls called Viva Forever! is about to hit the West End. The programme looks at the creative process behind the show that is produced by Judy Craymer and written by Jennifer Saunders in collaboration with the Spice Girls themselves.
title: The Spice Girls Story: Viva Forever!
